title: Reese Witherspoon cuts a casual figure in a tan sweater and a chambray midi skirt
text:
She's a busy mother of three.

But Reese Witherspoon got some quality time for herself on a trip to Nobu restaurant in Malibu on Saturday.

The 43-year-old Oscar winner covered up in a roomy tan sweater she paired with a midi-length chambray skirt.

Out: Reese Witherspoon got some quality time for herself on a trip to Nobu restaurant in Malibu on Saturday wearing a comfy outfit

She paired the look with camel-colored Birkenstocks and a crossbody bag with a textured matching strap.

Witherspoon also wore an oversize straw safari hat and a pair of black wayfarer sunglasses to protect herself from the SoCal sun.

Her sighting comes a couple of weeks after she shared advice on parenting in a video posted by her media company Hello Sunshine.

Chic: The 43-year-old Oscar winner covered up in a roomy tan sweater she paired with a midi-length skirt of a chambray material

'I’ve been a mom since 1999,' the actress divulged. 'I got pregnant when I was 22 and delivered when I was 23.'

Witherspoon shares Ava, 20 and Deacon, 15 with ex-husband Ryan Phillippe.

She also shares seven-year-old Tennessee James with husband Jim Toth.

Though she knows the ropes of being a mom now, Witherspoon confessed that she 'was scared' at the start.

Sun's out: Witherspoon also wore an oversize straw safari hat and a pair of black wayfarer sunglasses to protect herself from the SoCal sun

'I didn’t know what it was going to do to my job, my career,' she explained.

But as soon as she brought Ava into the world, her life changed for good.

'Everything you believe. Everything you eat. Every piece of independence you have. You can’t go out without thinking about another person,' she said.

'You don’t sleep anymore,' she said, continuing that the experience 'evolves from there.'

The Legally Blonde star continued to divulge that she's 'glad' she had kids when she was younger because 'having little kids is more physical and it’s really hard on your body.'

'Having a baby at 37 was so much harder,' she admitted.
description: She's a mom-of-three. But Reese Witherspoon got some quality time for herself on a trip to Nobu restaurant in Malibu on Saturday wearing a comfy outfit.
